name: MCU Store
tag_list: microcontroller, compiler, development-board, prototyping-board, programmer, logic-analyzer, oscilloscope, pic, dspic, avr, 8051, arm, gps, gsm, gprs, bluetooth, zigbee
overview:
MCU Store supply a range of products designed to make developing with, learning about and experimenting with microcontrollers easy.

Products include compilers, development boards and add-ons, device programmers, prototyping boards, robot kits and accessories, logic analyzers and oscilloscopes, tools and prototyping aids, plus a range of microcontrollers and other components.

Microcontrollers supported include Microchip PIC, PIC24, PIC32 and dsPIC, Atmel AVR and 8051, NXP ARM, Cypress PSoC, Freescale 68HC11, BASIC Stamp and Arduino. Other technologies covered include RS-232, RS-485, CAN, LIN, Ethernet, Bluetooth, ZigBee, IrDA and voice recognition.

Manufacturers represented include MikroElektronika, Inex, PoLabs and Zeroplus.

MCU Store customers include industry, educational organizations and hobbyists worldwide.
